name: Look Alive!
description:
Something wrong is going on inside the arcade. It's up to you to make the truth known.

The year is 1984.

Recrecade Inc. now has three locations across the United States. Their original location in Trinity Point has been closed for renovations for an undetermined amount of time. Still, higher staff of the arcade continue to frequent the area, and you've seen your fair share of unexplained deliveries to the building.

Collect the 6 cassette tapes! Escape with the truth! Enjoy the arcade!

For context of the game, be sure to take a look at the attached YouTube video. "Look Alive!" is an original game created and owned by Nathan Lathroum.
